title: Mobile-based Flipped Learning Program for Strengthening Mathematical Job Competencies

context.prior_knowledge: Basic arithmetic skills and workplace leadership experience
context.additional_context: A program emphasizing the development of applied mathematical skills to enhance managerial work efficiency.

learning_goals: Learners can perform pre-learning three or more times per week through 5-minute microlearning content provided on a flipped learning platform.
Learners can achieve a participation rate of over 90% by utilizing a motivation-driven quiz system.
Learners can submit work improvement plans applying mathematical problem-solving skills in project-based assessments.
difficulty: Moderate - Standard complexity with some constraints
